Discover Great Ebooks from Indie Authors and Publishers

Readers

DISCOVER

Discover over 540,000 multi-format ebooks, readable on any e-reading device. Sample before you buy. Over 84,000 free books.

SAVE MONEY

Smashwords ebooks cost a fraction of paper books. Read your books on any e-reading device (Kindle, iPad, Nook, iPhone, Sony Reader, Kobo, etc), or read online in your browser.

SUPPORT INDIE AUTHORS!

Discover tomorrow's great writers today, and show your appreciation by supporting their hard work. 85% of the net sales proceeds go directly to the author.

Authors/Agents/Publishers

FREE TO PUBLISH

Upload your masterpiece, either as as a Word .doc file that we'll convert to multiple popular ebook formats, and/or as a pre-formatted EPUB file, and we'll make it available for sale online immediately.

DISTRIBUTE

Smashwords is the world's largest distributor of indie ebooks, with over 540,000 titles. We distribute your book to major retailers such as Apple Books, Barnes & Noble, and Kobo.

EARN 85% NET

You set the price and receive 85% of the net sales proceeds.

Join Now For Free!

Twenty-eight days of the month, those who change are no different from those who have managed to stay uninfected—the normals, the High Bloods. But every full moon, they become the most ravenous creatures mankind has ever seen.

Now that Simone has a family and grandchildren of her own, Teri starts to wonder ‘what if?’

Insightful, wide ranging and informative, it's an inspiring companion for yoga teachers and students alike, offering a solid foundation for understanding all aspects of yoga today and ways to make the most of this powerful healing system.

Price: $2.99 USD. Words: 22,060. Language: English. Published: July 3, 2020. Categories: Nonfiction » Health, wellbeing, & medicine » Medicine

This book describes Diabetic Ketoacidosis, Diagnosis and Treatment and Related Diseases Just recently I had a patient who complained of light-head-ness and confusion. She had deep, rapid breathing with abdominal discomfort. I thought she may be having a transient ischemic attack Her blood pressure was normal but her blood sugar was found to be very high (524mg/dl). She had diabetic ketoacidosis.
